df

```py
df = pl.DataFrame(np.random.randint(0, 100, size=(10, 4)), 
                  columns=list('1234'))
```

```py
df.select(
    sorted(df.columns)
)
```

```py
df.select(
    sorted(df.columns, reverse=True)
)
```

```py
df[sorted(df.columns, reverse=True)]  # not recommended in Polars
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('names.csv')    
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('names.csv')
    .select(
    [
        'name',
        'age',
        pl.col('name').str.lengths().alias('length_of_name'),        
    ])
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .select(
        ['Name','Age']
    )
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .select(
        pl.exclude('PassengerId')
    )
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .select(
        pl.exclude("^S.*$")   # exclude all columns that starts with S
    )
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .select(
        pl.col('^S.*$')  # get all columns that starts with S
    )
)
q.collect()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .filter(
        pl.col('Name').str.contains('William$')       
    )
    .select(
        [
            'Name'
        ]
    )
)
q.collect().to_pandas()
```

```py
import polars as pl
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
    .filter(
        pl.col('Name').str.contains('William$').is_not()        
    )
    .select(
        [
            'Name'
        ]
    )
)
q.collect().to_pandas()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('names.csv')
    .select(
    [
        'name',
        pl.col('name').str.split(' ').alias('splitname'),
        'age',
    ])
)

q.collect()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('names.csv')
    .select(
    [
        'name',
        pl.col('name').str.split(' ').alias('split_name'),
        'age',
    ])
    .with_column(
        pl.struct(
            [
                pl.col('split_name').arr.get(i).alias(
                    'first_name' if i==0 else 'last_name') 
                for i in range(2)
            ]
        ).alias('split_name')
    )
)
q.collect()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('names.csv')
    .select(
    [
        'name',
        pl.col('name').str.split(' ').alias('split_name'),
        'age',
    ])
    .with_column(
        pl.struct(
            [
                pl.col('split_name').arr.get(i).alias(
                    'first_name' if i==0 else 'last_name') 
                for i in range(2)
            ]
        ).alias('split_name')
    )
    .unnest('split_name')
)
q.collect()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')
)
q.collect()['Name'].to_pandas().unique()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')        
    .select(
    [
        pl.col('Name').str.replace('Mlle.','Miss.'),
    ])
)
q.collect()
```

```py
q = (
    pl.scan_csv('Titanic_train.csv')        
    .select(
    [
        pl.col('Name').str.replace('Mlle.|Ms.|Mme.','Miss.'),
    ])
)
q.collect()
```
